data.title: Prime Video: Last Action Hero (4K UHD)
data.meta_description: Danny Madigan (Austin O'Brien - My Girl 2), a young cinema fan, is crazy about his all-time great movie hero, L.A. cop Jack Slater (Arny Schwarzenegger). Having received a magic golden cinema ticket, Danny is able to cross into movieland and meet the real life hero as well as all the baddies. But when the movie characters cross into real life everybody's in for a big shock.
data.text:
Last Action Hero (4K UHD)

Danny Madigan (Austin O'Brien - My Girl 2), a young cinema fan, is crazy about his all-time great movie hero, L.A. cop Jack Slater (Arny Schwarzenegger). Having received a magic golden cinema ticket, Danny is able to cross into movieland and meet the real life hero as well as all the baddies. But when the movie characters cross into real life everybody's in for a big shock.

IMDb 6.52 h 10 min1993

16+
